author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Splendid Metal's 27th AGM held on September 29, 2017
description: Notice dated 14th August, 2017 convening the 27th Annual General Meeting of the Company held on Friday, September 29, 2017.
articleBody: Please find enclosed, a copy of the Notice dated 14th August, 2017 convening the 27th Annual General Meeting of the Company held on Friday, 29th September, 2017 at Katriya Hotel &amp; Towers, #8, Raj bhavan Road, Somajiguda, Hyderabad-500082 at 12.00 noon.  The remote e-voting period commences on September 25th, 2017 (9:00 A.M.) and ends on September 28th, 2017 (5:00 P.M.). During this period members of the Company, holding shares either in physical form or in dematerialised form, as on the cut-off date of Friday, September 22nd, 2017, may cast their vote by remote e-voting. Any person, who acquires shares of the Company and become member of the Company after dispatch of the notice and holding shares as of the cut-off date i.e. 22nd September, 2017, may obtain the login ID and password by sending a request at evoting@nsdl.co.in or Issuer/ RTA and If the member is already registered with NSDL for e-voting then he/she can use his/her existing user ID and password for casting the vote. This may be treated as Compliance of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015 Source : BSE

headline: Sujana Metal Products to allot  9.95cr equity shares  to Yalamanchili Finance on preferential basis
description: Sujana Metal Products has informed that the Management Committee of Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on January 19, 2016 approved the issue and allotment of 9,95,60,000 equity shares of Rs 5 each at par on preferential basis to M/s. Yalamanchili Finance and Trading Private Limited.
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that the Management Committee of Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on January 19, 2016 approved the following:- Issue and allotment of 9,95,60,000 equity shares of Rs.5/- each at par on preferential basis to M/s. Yalamanchili Finance and Trading Private Limited in compliance with the terms and conditions of CDR package.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sujana Metal Products: Outcome of board meeting
description: Sujana Metal Products in its meeting held on Dec 28, 2015, has passed the resolutions subject to the approval of members of the Company by way of postal ballot to change the name of the Company from
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on December 28, 2015, has passed the following resolutions subject to the approval of members of the Company by way of postal ballot:1. To change the name of the Company from &quot;Sujana Metal Products Limited&quot; to &quot;SMPL Limited&quot;.2. To shift of the Registered Office of the Company from the State of Telangana to State of Maharashtra.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sujana Metal Products board meeting on Dec 28, 2015
description: Sujana Metal Products' board meeting will be held on December 28, 2015,  to consider the matters and approve the proposal of change in Name of the Company to SMPL Limited or such other name as approved by the Registrar of Companies, Andhra Pradesh &amp; Telangana. To consider the shifting of the Registered Office of the Company.
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on December 28, 2015, inter alia, to consider the following matters:1. To consider and approve the proposal of change in Name of the Company to SMPL Limited or such other name as approved by the Registrar of Companies, Andhra Pradesh &amp; Telangana.2. To consider the shifting of the Registered Office of the Company from the State of Telangana to the State of Maharashtra.In this connection, as per the Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading, the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company will remain closed for all Directors/Officers/Designated Employees of the Company from December 21, 2015 to December 30, 2015 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sujana Metal Products: Outcome of board meeting
description: Sujana Metal Products in its meeting held on August 28, 2015, has considered and approved the recommend to the members for appointment of Shri. R. K. Birla, Managing Director, who retires by rotation and being eligible, offers himself for re-appointment.
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on August 28, 2015, inter alia, has considered and approved the following:1. Recommend to the members for appointment of Shri. R. K. Birla, Managing Director, who retires by rotation and being eligible, offers himself for re-appointment.2. Recommend to the members for appointment of Smt. B. Sandhyasri, as an Independent Director of the Company for a term up to 5 years, under Section 149 of the Companies Act, 2013.3. Fixed the remuneration of Shri S. Hanumantha Rao, Director-Finance for a period not exceeding 3 years.4. Facility of E-Voting at the ensuing Annual General Meeting and to appoint scrutinizer for the same.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal

headline: Sujana Metal Products shifts its registered office
description: Sujana Metal Products approved shifting the Registered Office of the Company from No. 8-2-248/1/7/41, Plot No.41, Nagarjuna Hills, Punjagutta, Hyderabad - 500 082 to No. 8-2-248/1/7/18, Plot No. 18, Nagarjuna Hills, Punjagutta, Hyderabad -500 082, Telangana, w.e.f. April 01, 2015.
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that in terms of Section 12(4) of Companies Act, 2013 read with Rule 27 of the Companies (Incorporation) Rules, Board of Directors of the Company by way of circular resolution dated April 30, 2015 approved shifting the Registered Office of the Company from No. 8-2-248/1/7/41, Plot No.41, Nagarjuna Hills, Punjagutta, Hyderabad - 500 082 to No. 8-2-248/1/7/18, Plot No. 18, Nagarjuna Hills, Punjagutta, Hyderabad -500 082, Telangana, w.e.f. April 01, 2015.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal

headline: Sujana Metal standalone Dec '13 sales at Rs 764.91 crore
description: Sujana Metal Products has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 764.91 crore and a net loss of Rs 7.37 crore for the quarter ended Dec '13
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products has reported a standalone sales turnover of Rs 764.91 crore and a net loss of Rs 7.37 crore for the quarter ended Dec '13. Other income for the quarter was Rs 0.05 crore.For the quarter ended Dec 2012 the standalone sales turnover was Rs 913.30 crore and net profit was Rs 0.28 crore, and other income Rs 11.11 crore.Sujana Metal shares closed at 1.55 on February 12, 2014 (NSE) and has given 106.67% returns over the last 6 months and -56.94% over the last 12 months.Sujana Metal ProductsStandalone Quarterly Results-------- in Rs. author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sujana Metal: Outcome of the management committee meeting
description: Sujana Metal decided to withdraw the merger petition which is pending with Hon'ble High Court, Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, due to the change in circumstances &amp; business environment especially in the Steel Industry &amp; also the uncertainty with regard to the Government policies in respect of Steel Industry and overall slowdown in economic conditions.
articleBody: Sujana Metal Products Ltd has informed BSE that it has been decided by the Management Committee of Board Directors of the Company at its meeting held on December 17, 2013 to withdraw the merger petition which is pending with Hon'ble High Court, Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, due to the change in circumstances and business environment especially in the Steel Industry and also the uncertainty with regard to the Government policies in respect of Steel Industry and overall slowdown in economic conditions and hence in such a situation the proposed scheme of amalgamation is not viable in the interest of the company and its stakeholders under current business environment.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sujana Metal
